metadata.title: Roșia Montană is not just a holiday, is an experience!
metadata.text: We are located in Roșia Montana, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania, an area with mountains, valleys and lakes, but also with a rich culture and history because of the patrimony built by various civilizations that came here since antiquity to extract gold. To discover them we offer guided tours and there are also marked trails.

sections.text: Roșia Montană is not just a holiday, is an experience!

sections.title: To see
sections.text: We are located in Roșia Montana, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania, an area with mountains, valleys and lakes, but also with a rich culture and history because of the patrimony built by various civilizations that came here since antiquity to extract gold - see bellow some experiences to discover our area.

subtitle: Have a walk in the historic center
text: Have a walk in the historic center of the oldest documented settlement in Romania, Rosia Montana year 131, to see the patrimony buildings, churches and cemeteries belonging to 5 different confessions, goldsmith houses, stamp mills, former lofts, old cemeteries or mining exhibits. To visit and discover their stories we organize
in the historic center of Roșia Montană.

subtitle: Find the history of the goldsmiths - Museums
text: Visit the museums from our area where you can see the gold mining techniques evolution, tools and machines used in mining industry, golden veins and galleries.
- at the Mining Museum Roșia Montană will see a roman gallery made 2000 years ago and the gold processing machines
- at the Museum Aurul Brad will see how a gold veins looks and minerals exhibits

subtitle: Discover an 'Open air museum'. Hay houses
text: A walking tour among the villages around our area is like a journey back in time. A part of the household, houses, stables, churches remained preserved exactly as they were a few tens or even hundreds of years ago, covered with hay or wood. On request we also organize
to these areas. We recommend to make this tour on bike but it is also possible by car followed by short walks.

subtitle: See the communist mega-projects
text: Discover the mining megaprojects of the communism: open pits, huge wasting lakes, tools and and indutrial buildings, see their impact upon the nature and the price we paid to obtain the precious metals. Near us is the Roșia Poieni (the bigest open pit of Europe), the wasting lake Geamăna (that sunken 2 villages) and open pit Cetate. We do
to these objectives, but you have to make an early
as we need to make a request to the mining institution to let us visit.

subtitle: See where and how started 'Save Rosia Montana' campaign
text: Visit the places where during 15 years were protests and manifestations against the Canadian mining company who wanted to open a big gold mining using cyanide to extract the gold that was left. There were huge street protests in Romania and abroad against this project. To see where and how the 'Save Rosia Montana' campaign has started, how are looking the places that should have been impacted by the canadian project and the community impact, we organize
of the 'Save Rosia Montana' campaign.

images.text: Find out why were made these sculptures by a NGO from Paris at a farm.
See the places where environment and activism festivals took place.
See on the spot what was the canadians plan and how are looking the impacted areas.

subtitle: Hike on the marked trails to the Nature’s Monuments
text: Hiking in the nature, fresh air or bike rides? Come and discover the Rosia Montana massifs where are various natural sites perfect for hiking or biking. From the historic center are starting 4 marked trails of different difficulty levels and time (3h, 5h or 8h).

images.text: Raven Stone - natural reservation. Here are the oldest galleries in Rosia Montana, made by the agatârși using only water and fire.
Sphinx - the cross was placed by the miners to have luck while searching for gold.
The tight peak of Sulei Massif.
Stalagmites of the former gold galleries.

subtitle: Enjoy the silence. Visit the lakes of Roșia
text: Over 100 lakes were built during the Habsburg period to help processing the gold but today are only 7 left. To visit them follow the 'Lake trail' (marked with blue dot - 4h hiking) that starts from the historic center of Rosia Montana.

images.text: Țarinii Lake - a little mountain lake with a wonderful view especially during the autumn
Big Lake or Hearth Lake (due to his heart shape).
Pine lake - the house belongs to a painter who use the view as inspiration for his work.

subtitle: Visit the basalt roof of the Carpathians - Detunata
text: This 80m high massive is a protected area with huge basalt columns through which small glaciers appear occasionally. The area has great legends, the people are welcoming and they also make some amazing cheese pies. To discover follow the Red Cross - 3h marked trail that starts near our house.

text: The daffodils are blooming in May in a meadow near Rosia Montana, the smell and the beautiful landscape from here is something that you will never forget. To reach it will go 1h by car + 30min by foot (we organize
in every weekend of May to this meadow so make an early
and let us know that you want to join the daffodil meadow tour.

subtitle: Discover the Vulcan massif
text: The Vulcan massif is a former volcano that erupted 2 millions years ago. The most interesting fact it's is convex shape that can be observed oance you are on the top of it. You can get here by bike (3h) or by car (45min) followed by a 1h hike.

subtitle: Live as a local farmer
text: We put you in touch with the local farmers from our area where you can take part to their daily works, easy to learn (hand cow milking, local food and drinks making, the traditional haymaking which will be used in the winter for the animals). Your help would be really helpful for the farmers and for you will be an unique experience as you will be connected to the nature, will help preserving the biodiversity and will learn traditional crafts very well preserved in our area. If you want to live as a local inform us while making a

subtitle: Find the local stories. Guided tours
text: We recommend to visit our area with a guide because the local stories matters and Rosia Montana has a golden past. We organize guided tours to discover the historic center, the objectives used for gold mining (lakes, galleries, open pits), the proposed UNESCO area, the impact of the canadian mining project and the protests or other attractions from our area. If you are interested in guided tours specify while making a
and we will contact you after with more details.

subtitle: Have a 'delicious' hike
text: Depending upon the season, our area offers various goodies directly from the source. If you come in May or June will find strawberries and fir buds in Jully or August raspberry, cranberries, blackberry or mushrooms, so have a hike on the sounding massifs where you can find and pick forest fruits or mushrooms.
